name: Champion
proficiencies: Saving Throw: STR +9 | Saving Throw: CON +6 | Skill: Athletics +9 | Skill: Intimidation +5, Perception +6

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (2/Day).
special_abilities.desc: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

actions.name: Greatsword.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

actions.name: Shortbow.
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit:Â 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
